# NativeMethods.AddFontResource method

Adds the font resource from the specified file to the system font table. The font can subsequently be used for text output by any application. For more information, please see https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/windows/win32/api/wingdi/nf-wingdi-addfontresourcew.

```csharp
public static int AddFontResource(string lpFileName)
```
